analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern the establishment, modification, and authorization of various medals, awards, certificates, badges, and seals within the US government, particularly those related to military service and civilian contributions. They cover criteria for eligibility, design specifications, and the order of precedence for these honors. The documents also establish committees and boards to oversee the selection and awarding processes. Some documents address specific conflicts or periods of service for which medals are authorized, while others focus on recognizing service within specific government entities or for humanitarian efforts.
title: Government Honors and Awards
